entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Orillia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:37 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 2:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -8.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -13.7°C
Wind: SW 33 km/h gust 61 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind southwest 70 km/h gusting to 90. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
